citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on
06/17/2015.
Inspector knocked on front and back doors, honked the horn several times during the 30 minutes waiting in the
driveway.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

Inspector knocked on front and back doors, honked the horn several times during the 30 minutes waiting in the
driveway.
